StiMaterialInteraction.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 // StiMaterialInteraction
00002 //
00003 // 7 Aug 01, Ben Norman, Kent State
00004 //
00005 // Provides functionality for determining thicknesses of materials
00006 // traversed by tracks, etc.
00007 
00008 #ifndef STI_MATERIAL_INTERACTION_H
00009 #define STI_MATERIAL_INTERACTION_H
00010 
00011 // uncertainty along detector edges (in cm)
00012 #define EDGE_HALF_WIDTH 5.
00013 
00014 class StiKalmanTrackNode;
00015 class StThreeVectorD;
00016 
00017 // indicate where an intersection occurs
00018 typedef enum {
00019     kFailed = -1,         // could not find intersection
00020     kHit,                                
00021     kEdgePhiPlus, kEdgeZminus, kEdgePhiMinus, kEdgeZplus, 
00022     kMissPhiPlus, kMissZminus, kMissPhiMinus, kMissZplus
00023 } StiIntersection;
00024 
00025 
00026 
00027 class StiMaterialInteraction{
00028 
00029 public:
00030     StiMaterialInteraction(){}
00031     virtual ~StiMaterialInteraction(){}
00032 
00033     static void nameForIntersection(StiIntersection &intersection, 
00034                                     string &name);
00035 
00036     // returns an integer value indicating whether & where the extrapolation
00037     // of the given track node intersects the given detector.  Also returns
00038     // (via reference arguments) the local x coordinate of the intersection
00039     // with the detector active plane,
00040     // the thickness in radiation lengths between the node (exclusive) & 
00041     // the detector (inclusive), and the equivalent density.
00042     //
00043     // Note:  this will not return thickness info of other detectors between
00044     // the node and the detector.  It is the caller's responsibility to 
00045     // only go one step at a time.
00046     static StiIntersection findIntersection(
00047         const StiKalmanTrackNode *pNode, const StiDetector *pDetector,
00048         double &dXlocal, double &dThickness, double &dDensity);
00049 protected:
00050     static StiIntersection findPlanarIntersection(
00051         const StiKalmanTrackNode *pNode, const StiDetector *pDetector,
00052         double &dXlocal, double &dThickness, double &dDensity);
00053     static StiIntersection findCylindricalIntersection(
00054         const StiKalmanTrackNode *pNode, const StiDetector *pDetector,
00055         double &dXlocal, double &dThickness, double &dDensity);
00056     static StiIntersection findConicalIntersection(
00057         const StiKalmanTrackNode *pNode, const StiDetector *pDetector,
00058         double &dXlocal, double &dThickness, double &dDensity);
00059 
00060     static double findThickness(const StiDetector *pDetector, 
00061                                 const StThreeVectorD *pPoint,
00062                                 const StThreeVectorD *pDirection);
00063 
00064 };
00065 
00066 #endif // defined STI_MATERIAL_INTERACTION_H
